note.p: Schoolmaster. Born in Hatherleigh, Devon. Performed crossing experiments on peas.
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 5 January 2015)
Registers of births, marriages and deaths surrendered to the non-parochial Registers Commissions of 1837 and 1857 (RG4/1214), General Register Office, England
